ygData.subject: Re: Our spell abilities
ygData.msgSnippet: well i believe that we do have some healing powers, at higher lvls, there is the dark embrace, and we get some rather good spells too, but there is one thing
ygData.messageBody:
well i believe that we do have some healing powers, at higher lvls, there is
the dark embrace, and we get some rather good spells too, but there is one
thing that i dont like about this class and that is the harm touch is a save
vs attack, in other words you can make a save on it as far as i know, but
the paladins lay on hands is automatic.

just another 2 cents

-----Original Message-----
From: allan_klima@... <allan_klima@...>
To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, April 22, 1999 2:49 PM
Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Our spell abilities


>From: allan_klima@...
>
>I was thinking about the spell casting abilities the shadowknights. I
honestly think that compared to the other hybrid classes with get a bit
shorthanded in the field of spell casting.
>
>If were are the 'opposing force' to the paladins, shouldn't we have similar
opposing forces? Yes they have their healing touch and we have our harming
touch. But what about their abilities and to cure and heal. These are
directly drawn upon from their cleric like nature. Wouldn't it be more fair
if we had similar spell abilities like the main theme of life draining
spells that the necros get? At least the weakest of them, like lifetap?
>
>Well, its just my 2 cents worth.
>
>
>Keziah Tho'tep, Servant of Innoruuk.
>BristleBain Server.
>
